-----------------------------------------------------------

Volume One Emphasizes how to apply techiques of process design and interpret results into mechanical equipment details.

Volume Two focuses on distillation and packed towers, and presents the methods and fundamentals of plant design along with supplemental mechanical and related data, nomographs, data charts and heuristics.

The Fourth Edition is significantly expanded and updated, with new topics that ensure readers can analyze problems and find practical design methods and solutions to accomplish their process design objectives
